template: Create compelling, SEO-optimized titles for this image suitable for stock photography.
You must generate titles for the ORIGINAL image AND 5 alternative edited versions.
Requirements for each title:
- Maximum {max_length} characters
- Start with the main subject (e.g., "Silhouette of a horse", "Mountain landscape", "Woman practicing yoga")
- Add specific context: location, time, setting, or key characteristics
- Be concrete and factual, not abstract or poetic
- Include distinguishing details (breed, ethnicity, landmark, season) when visible
- Use natural, search-friendly language
- NO generic words like "image", "photo", "picture", "beautiful", "stunning"
- Draw inspiration from existing successful stock photos or photos by user DannyJPN that have similar visual elements and composition
Examples of good titles:
- "Crater Lake, Mount Mazama, Oregon, USA, at night"
- "Silhouette of Arabian horse at sunset in open field"
- "Woman practicing yoga Natarajasana pose at sunrise on beach"
Alternative versions to generate:
- original: Title for the unmodified image
- _bw: Black and white version - add "black and white", "monochrome", or "B&W" naturally
- _negative: Color negative version - add "negative", "inverted colors", or "color inversion"
- _sharpen: Sharpened version - add "sharp", "detailed", "crisp", or "high-detail"
- _misty: Misty/foggy version - add "misty", "foggy", "hazy", or "ethereal"
- _blurred: Blurred version - add "blurred", "soft focus", "abstract", or "dreamy"
{context_section}Return ONLY valid JSON with this exact structure:
"original": "title for original image",
"_bw": "title for black and white version",
"_negative": "title for color negative version",
"_sharpen": "title for sharpened version",
"_misty": "title for misty version",
"_blurred": "title for blurred version"
Return ONLY the JSON object, no other text or explanation.
Create detailed, SEO-optimized descriptions for this image suitable for stock photography.
You must generate descriptions for the ORIGINAL image AND 5 alternative edited versions.
Requirements for each description:
- Maximum {max_length} characters
- DO NOT just copy the title and add connecting words - provide NEW factual details
- Describe what you SEE in concrete, specific terms:
* Specific objects and their arrangement/composition
* Colors, textures, materials, patterns
* Lighting conditions (golden hour, low-light, backlit, softbox, etc.)
* Location details (city, region, landmark, environment type)
* Weather/atmospheric conditions (foggy, clear, stormy)
* Time indicators (sunrise, noon, evening, night)
* Scale and perspective (aerial view, close-up, wide angle)
* Actions or states being depicted
- Add context that's visible: season, setting type, natural/urban environment
- Include mood/atmosphere ONLY if clearly visible in the image
- Be factual and literal - describe what IS there, not what it could be used for
- Use natural, flowing prose that reads like a single coherent sentence or two
- Draw inspiration from existing successful stock photos or photos by user DannyJPN that have similar titles and visual themes
Example of good description:

"Silhouette of woman practicing the yoga pose Natarajasana, or Lord of the Dance Pose during flaming orange, red and purple sunrise on Campeche beach in Florian√≥polis, at the Atlantic Ocean in Santa Catarina, Brazil. The surface of the water is calm and peaceful mirroring the woman and the small island in the background. A small wave can be seen approaching from the island."
Alternative versions adjustments:
- original: Description for the unmodified image
- _bw: Black and white - remove color descriptions, add phrases about monochrome aesthetic, contrast, tones
- _negative: Color negative - adjust color descriptions for inversion, add phrases about surreal color palette
- _sharpen: Sharpened - keep all details, add phrases about enhanced sharpness, crisp details, clarity
- _misty: Misty/foggy - adjust visibility descriptions, add phrases about ethereal atmosphere, fog effect
- _blurred: Blurred - adjust sharpness descriptions, add phrases about soft blur effect, abstract quality
{title_section}{context_section}Return ONLY valid JSON with this exact structure:
"original": "description for original image",
"_bw": "description for black and white version",
"_negative": "description for color negative version",
"_sharpen": "description for sharpened version",
"_misty": "description for misty version",
"_blurred": "description for blurred version"
Return ONLY the JSON object, no other text or explanation.
Generate {count} relevant, SEO-optimized keywords for this image suitable for stock photography.
You must generate keywords for the ORIGINAL image AND 5 alternative edited versions.
Keyword Strategy - Use this hierarchy:
1. Main subjects (specific): Objects, people, animals, landmarks visible in image
2. Context (specific): Location type, environment, setting, activity
3. Visual qualities: Colors, lighting conditions, perspective, composition
4. Mood/concepts: Emotions, themes, abstract ideas clearly conveyed
5. Technical: Photo type, orientation, season, time of day
6. Broader categories: General terms that encompass the specific elements
Requirements for each version:
- PREFER single-word keywords ("sunset", "mountain", "horse", "forest")
- Multi-word keywords ONLY when single words are ambiguous ("golden-hour", "aerial-view", "yoga-pose")
- Balance: Mix ~60% specific terms, ~30% medium-broad terms, ~10% broad categories
- Use precise terms over vague ones: "spruce" not just "tree", "Arabian" not just "horse"
- Include ALL words from title and key description terms
- Add color names if prominent: "orange", "purple", "blue-sky"
- NO meaningless generics: "image", "photo", "picture", "beautiful", "nice"
- Draw inspiration from existing successful stock photos or photos by user DannyJPN that have similar titles and descriptions
Example hierarchy for a sunset horse photo:
Specific: horse, arabian, silhouette, sunset, field, prairie
Context: outdoor, nature, equestrian, pasture
Visual: orange, golden, backlit, sky, horizon
Mood: peaceful, serene, freedom, majestic
Technical: landscape, horizontal, evening, dusk
Broad: animal, mammal, agriculture, rural
Alternative versions adjustments:
- original: Keywords for the unmodified image
- _bw: Black and white - remove color keywords, add: black-and-white, monochrome, grayscale, bw, contrast, tones
- _negative: Color negative - adjust color keywords for inversion, add: negative, inverted, reversed-colors, surreal, artistic-effect
- _sharpen: Sharpened - keep all keywords, add: sharp, sharpened, detailed, crisp, clarity, high-definition
- _misty: Misty/foggy - adjust clarity keywords, add: misty, foggy, hazy, fog, mist, ethereal, dreamy, atmospheric
- _blurred: Blurred - adjust/remove sharp keywords, add: blurred, blur, soft-focus, gaussian-blur, abstract, dreamy
{title_section}{description_section}Return ONLY valid JSON with this exact structure:
"original": ["keyword1", "keyword2", ...],
"_bw": ["keyword1", "keyword2", ...],
"_negative": ["keyword1", "keyword2", ...],
"_sharpen": ["keyword1", "keyword2", ...],
"_misty": ["keyword1", "keyword2", ...],
"_blurred": ["keyword1", "keyword2", ...]
Each array must contain at least {count} keywords.

Return ONLY the JSON object, no other text or explanation. Keywords must not contain any other characters than letters unless english grammar says otherwise. Avoid the - character where possible. Keywords consisting of mroe words must always be separated by space
